contentJson: ["Paul, a prisoner of Christ Jesus, and Timothy our brother,",{"lineBreak":true},"To Philemon our beloved fellow worker,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Paul, a prisoner of Christ Jesus, and Timothy our brother, 
To Philemon our beloved fellow worker,

contentJson: ["to Apphia our sister, to Archippus our fellow soldier, and to the church that meets at your",{"noteId":0},"house:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to Apphia our sister, to Archippus our fellow soldier, and to the church that meets at your house:

contentJson: ["Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

contentJson: ["I always thank my God, remembering you in my prayers,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I always thank my God, remembering you in my prayers,

contentJson: ["because I hear about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because I hear about your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints.

contentJson: ["I pray that your partnership in the faith may become effective as you fully acknowledge every good thing that is ours in Christ."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I pray that your partnership in the faith may become effective as you fully acknowledge every good thing that is ours in Christ.

contentJson: ["I take great joy and encouragement in your love, because you, brother, have refreshed the hearts of the saints."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I take great joy and encouragement in your love, because you, brother, have refreshed the hearts of the saints.

contentJson: ["So although in Christ I am bold enough to order you to do what is proper,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So although in Christ I am bold enough to order you to do what is proper,

contentJson: ["I prefer to appeal on the basis of love. For I, Paul, am now aged, and a prisoner of Christ Jesus as well."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I prefer to appeal on the basis of love. For I, Paul, am now aged, and a prisoner of Christ Jesus as well.

contentJson: ["I appeal to you for my child Onesimus,",{"noteId":1},"whose father I became while I was in chains."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I appeal to you for my child Onesimus, whose father I became while I was in chains.

contentJson: ["Formerly he was useless to you, but now he has become useful both to you and to me."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Formerly he was useless to you, but now he has become useful both to you and to me.

contentJson: ["I am sending back to you him who is my very heart."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am sending back to you him who is my very heart.

contentJson: ["I would have liked to keep him with me, so that on your behalf he could minister to me in my chains for the gospel."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I would have liked to keep him with me, so that on your behalf he could minister to me in my chains for the gospel.

contentJson: ["But I did not want to do anything without your consent, so that your goodness will not be out of compulsion, but by your own free will."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I did not want to do anything without your consent, so that your goodness will not be out of compulsion, but by your own free will.

contentJson: ["For perhaps this is why he was separated from you for a while, so that you might have him back for good—"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For perhaps this is why he was separated from you for a while, so that you might have him back for good—

contentJson: ["no longer as a slave, but better than a slave, as a beloved brother. He is especially beloved to me, but even more so to you, both in person and in the Lord."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: no longer as a slave, but better than a slave, as a beloved brother. He is especially beloved to me, but even more so to you, both in person and in the Lord.

contentJson: ["So if you consider me a partner, receive him as you would receive me."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So if you consider me a partner, receive him as you would receive me.

contentJson: ["But if he has wronged you in any way or owes you anything, charge it to my account."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But if he has wronged you in any way or owes you anything, charge it to my account.

contentJson: ["I, Paul, write this with my own hand. I will repay it—not to mention that you owe me your very self."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I, Paul, write this with my own hand. I will repay it—not to mention that you owe me your very self.

contentJson: ["Yes, brother, let me have some benefit",{"noteId":2},"from you in the Lord. Refresh my heart in Christ."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yes, brother, let me have some benefit from you in the Lord. Refresh my heart in Christ.

contentJson: ["Confident of your obedience, I write to you, knowing that you will do even more than I ask."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Confident of your obedience, I write to you, knowing that you will do even more than I ask.

contentJson: ["In the meantime, prepare a guest room for me, because I hope that through your prayers I will be restored to you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the meantime, prepare a guest room for me, because I hope that through your prayers I will be restored to you.

contentJson: ["Epaphras, my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus, sends you greetings,"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Epaphras, my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus, sends you greetings,

contentJson: ["as do Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, and Luke, my fellow workers."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: as do Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, and Luke, my fellow workers.

contentJson: ["The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.",{"noteId":3}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
